      • NEmitter

        public NEmitter(java.lang.String sourceFile,
                java.util.ArrayList<CLFile> clFiles,
                java.lang.String ra)
        Construct an NEmitter instance.
        ??:
        sourceFile - the source j-- program file name.
        clFiles - list of CLFile objects.
        ra - register allocation scheme (naive, linear, or graph).

    • ??????

        Set the destination directory for the SPIM files to the specified value.

      • errorHasOccurred

        public boolean errorHasOccurred()
        Has an emitter error occurred up to now?
        ??:
        true or false.

      • write

        public void write()
        Write out SPIM file(s) to the file system. The destination directory for the files can be set using the destinationDir(String dir) method.
